name: i have no words, i must shout
name_original: i have no words, i must shout
description:
in memory of Harlan Ellison.

one text adventure without words

you must need download the external pdf

or will be extreme confuse in game

download Quest 

https://textadventures.co.uk/quest

subtitle
! : you found a item, check the text book
!-!: you found a puzzle
!!!: you found a exit
!?: you found a complex puzzle, check text book
?: Write observations
??: Draw to help
???: game over ,back to last checkpoint
?!?: savepoint
